headline: REITs playbook: Investors must remain 'selective' post–rate cuts
summary: The Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points at its September meeting on Wednesday — the first rate cut in 2025. The US central bank currently forecasts two more rate cuts in 2025. Mizuho Americas senior REIT and homebuilders analyst Haendel St. Juste joins Asking for a Trend with Josh Lipton to discuss how to play the real estate investment trusts (REITs) sector amid the backdrop of rate cuts. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Asking for a Trend.
